name: Venusaur

abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

flavorText: This plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

strengths: Energy Trans enables instant power-up of new attackers
Move energy away from Pokemon about to be KO'd
weaknesses: Energy Trans only moves energy, doesn't add new
counters: Energy Removal - Reduces total energy pool

competitiveHistory: Venusaur saw play in Grass-focused decks, though it was less popular than Blastoise because Energy Trans redistributes rather than accelerates energy. The 'VenuCenter' combo (Venusaur + Pokemon Center) was a known strategy.

rulings.ruling: Energy Trans can be used multiple times per turn, moving one Grass Energy at a time.
Energy Trans can only move Grass Energy cards, not other types.
Energy Trans moves existing energy; it does not allow additional energy attachment.
